Title: 6.81 Xin, The Ember Spirit Mid/ganker build, by MrDerwisj

ItemTooltips.stout_shield: For extra sustain in the mid lane, considering you're melee + builds into vanguard/poor mans shield
ItemTooltips.bottle: Definitely a bottle-rush hero. His abilities are on a low cooldown, and his int gain isn't great. Refilling your bottle in the fountain using a tp+your ult is great as well!
ItemTooltips.tango: If you feel you need more regen, get an extra salve as well. But since this is a fast bottle build, one tango should do.
ItemTooltips.phase_boots: Exploiting the already great movement speed this hero already has. If you feel you are lacking in mana however, and you can't rune control, get arcane boots.
ItemTooltips.vladmir: Can be great if your team doesn't have a natural vlads carrier. You get lifesteal from your autoattacks + Sleight Of Fists. The extra damage doesn't hurt.
ItemTooltips.assault: Extra - armor, always great for physical dps. Not the best item pickup but doable.
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: Our friend Xin is useless when silenced/stunned, and will die rapidly. Get this item to not have those things happen to you. (if you're worried)
ItemTooltips.sphere: Same as black king bar. The early perseverance gets rid of some of your mana problems and gives you some health regen.
ItemTooltips.rapier: This speaks for itself. Go for it if you feel you have the power!!
ItemTooltips.radiance: If you get ridiculously fed, this stacks with your Flame Guard. Pretty funny!
ItemTooltips.greater_crit: Your sleight of fists can crit!
ItemTooltips.basher: Chance to bash on every hit is great. Works on sleight of fists.
ItemTooltips.bfury: If you're really overfarmed, and you're versus illusion/summon based heroes (like PL, meepo,...) get 2 of these. Decent mana and health regen will keep you in the fights longer and make your sleight of fist hurt pretty hard.
ItemTooltips.sange_and_yasha: I like getting the Sange for the maim chance and extra hp.
ItemTooltips.satanic: Using the active on this with Sleight of Fists brings you up to full health in no time! Expensive, but a decent pickup nonetheless.
ItemTooltips.mjollnir: Not great, but the active is pretty powerful. The attack speed is mostly redundant on this hero though.
ItemTooltips.maelstrom: Honestly, don't bother upgrading to mjollnir. This hero doesn't need the attack speed. Every Sleight Of Fists hit counts as an attack, so if this procs your damage goes way up.
ItemTooltips.desolator: -Armor when using sleight of fists... It's great if your team has other physical dps, and gives you a bit extra damage.
ItemTooltips.yasha: Extra damage, and again, the +% movespeed is great.
ItemTooltips.arcane_boots: A great alternative to phase boots, getting arcane boots on this hero gets rid of some of the mana issues this hero has.
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: Same as phase boots, going fast is good. The +% movespeed scales great on a hero with this fast base movespeed. Extra mana to use, a bit more hp...
ItemTooltips.abyssal_blade: If the game is tied but you're still far ahead this is a very solid choice. You can use the activate while using sleight of fists, and gives a very solid damage boost.

AbilityTooltips.ember_spirit_searing_chains: Max this first for the disable. With this and flame guard + some right click you should be able to run people down.
AbilityTooltips.ember_spirit_sleight_of_fist: With the slight "nerf" this has received, it only becomes useful once you get items. Hence why maxing this last is ideal.
AbilityTooltips.ember_spirit_flame_guard: Max this to run people down. It's basically a buffed radiance. Since 6.81 this also stops doom damage, so try to predict when doom is getting used!
AbilityTooltips.ember_spirit_activate_fire_remnant: Costs a lot of mana, but does decent damage, is good for juking and other neat tricks.
AbilityTooltips.ember_spirit_fire_remnant: You can gank really effectively by placing one of these in mid, tp'ing to another tower, ganking, and then jumping back to your remnant. Also this is a decent nuke. Be sure to save one for escaping though.
